reviewText: Terrific and highly educative course with excellent top-notch instructor who knows well how to explain and teach subject matter and has a high level of mastery of the subject.

Got it for my 8th grader to begin prepping for high school geometry next year.  Instructor has great passion for his subject which makes the lessons go by fast.  Son struggles a little with the instructor's accent (Australian?, British?).
Instructor is very entertaining.  Seems to have a deep grasp of the subject matter.
